channel.title: Comments on: Deploying is the new Compiling

item.title: By: josephscott
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2012/05/08/deploying-is-the-new-compiling/#comment-118110">Buhake Sindi</a>.
Sure, my modification is small. Randall Munroe deserves all the credit.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Buhake Sindi.

Sure, my modification is small. Randall Munroe deserves all the credit.

item.title: By: Sindi's Blog
item.dc:creator: Sindi's Blog
item.description: […] Image is a modified xkcd commic strip. Credit and thanks goes to Joseph Scott. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Image is a modified xkcd commic strip. Credit and thanks goes to Joseph Scott. […]

item.title: By: Buhake Sindi
item.dc:creator: Buhake Sindi
item.description:
Hi Joseph,
Can I used the modified XKCD commit strip on my blog? I will credit you and XKCD on the blog and send you the link to the post.
Thanks,
Kind Regard,
Buhake Sindi
item.content:encoded:
Hi Joseph,

Can I used the modified XKCD commit strip on my blog? I will credit you and XKCD on the blog and send you the link to the post.

Thanks,

Kind Regard,

Buhake Sindi
